name: JUMPE
description:
This game is submitted to Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1

This game is about a man who is stuck on another planet. He has to get out of there but he can't jump. He needs an external force to jump. That's why ollie the AI helps him by placing some jump pads for him to jump. They both  are STRONGER TOGETHER

How to play 

WASD - for movement

mouse - to look around

fall on the jump pad - to jump

Touch the green particle thing to proceed to the next level.

use the jump pads to proceed to the next level

System Requirement

processor - any quad-core processor

ram minimum - 6GB  Recommended - 8GB

GPU - Integrated Graphics

NOTE* - This Game is not for mac and Linux
